TopicTitle: What happend to that Modular base system?

Articles.Content: Does anyone have the link to that modular base system? I think it was in this thread. It had kethane trucks and a little rover that moved the parts around. It was pretty well thought out. I'd like to check it out.
Moved to General Discussion. Please remember that the Spacecraft Exchange is for sharing craft, not hunting for them. Also remember that you can do a forum search, or even a google search, in future

Also remember that you can do a forum search, or even a google search.

Just looking to save peoples' time. =)
